channel.title: Hmm.. help on changing no point.. [READ} will rep -- ++ =)
channel.description:
hello i was wondering if you could tell me how to change the attack style..because i want..

oh ive done this one before it says at tops creen ownage pk scape i have chnged it be4 i forgot where though.. ive checked client.JAVA and it isn't their.
